Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that ##the Market## has #6# major items.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Saria's Song#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say Goron fabrics protect against more than fire.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #a Pouch of Silver Rupees for the Shadow Temple#.
